Question
========

Which of the following characteristics of a commercial news broadcast on TV are discrete stochastic variables?

I. Number of commercial breaks (e.g., three blocks).™. II. Length of the first commercial break (e.g., 4 minutes).Ÿ. III. Whether fatal car accidents were reported (0 = there were no fatal accidents reported, 1 = at least one fatal accident was reported).‖ IV. Whether rain was predicted (0 = 'no rain' was predicted, 1
= 'rain' is predicted).

Answerlist
----------

* I, II and III are discrete stochastic variables.
* I, II and IV are discrete stochastic variables.
* I, III and IV are discrete stochastic variables.
* II, III and IV are discrete stochastic variables.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* I, II and III are discrete stochastic variables...: Incorrect
* I, II and IV are discrete stochastic variables...: Incorrect
* I, III and IV are discrete stochastic variables...: Correct
* II, III and IV are discrete stochastic variables...: Incorrect
